content:
I apologize for the incomplete response. Here is the rest of the revised 4-week workout program:

Week 3 (Continued):

Friday: Upper Body

* Bench Press (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Pull-ups (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Shoulder Press (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Tricep Dips (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Bicep Curls (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Lateral Raises (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Push-ups (3 sets of 15 reps)

Week 4:

Monday: Lower Body

* Squats (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Leg Press (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Step-ups (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Calf Raises (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Single Leg Toe Touch Squats (3 sets of 15 reps per leg)
* Glute Raises (3 sets of 15 reps)

Wednesday: Upper Body

* Incline Bench Press (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Row (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Push-ups (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Tricep Extension (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Hammer Curls (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Lateral Raises (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Shoulder Press (3 sets of 15 reps)

Friday: Lower Body

* Deadlifts (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Leg Press (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Lunges (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Calf Raises (3 sets of 15 reps)
* Single Leg Toe Touch Squats (3 sets of 15 reps per leg)
* Glute Raises (3 sets of 15 reps)

I hope this revised program meets your needs! Please let me know if you have any questions or need further guidance.
